comment: This has proven to be effective. Tpi kerajaan mana pandang, semua sibuk dgn jawatan.
amr:

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (p / prove-01
            :ARG1 (e / effective-04
                  :ARG0 (t / this)))
      :snt2 (a / and
            :op1 (s / string-entity
                  :value "tpi kerajaan"
                  :mod (p2 / pandang))
            :op2 (s2 / string-entity
                  :value "sibuk"
                  :mod (s3 / semua))
            :op3 (s4 / string-entity
                  :value "gn"
                  :mod (j / jawatan))))
